content: live stitches on spare needle of same working size or smaller see photos on p 2 thread tail yarn onto tapestry needle graft live stitches to provisionally cast-on stitches to close the tube forming your finished bracelet with the marble inside when all stitches have been joined tuck tail yarn into the closed tube and enjoy your new fidget toy see photos on p 2 shana s cohen shanalines@gmail com march 2024 v1 2 personal use only #marblefidgetbracelet #shanalines_designs 1 marble fidget bracelet photos here are a few photos showing the process k in the round until work measures once you are satisfied with the length weave your tail ends into the inside of approximately 1 2 5 cm longer than cut working yarn leaving at least a 12 the bracelet and trim the ends enjoy wrist after placing the marble in the 30 cm tail place provisionally cast-on your finished bracelet open tube try on the piece before stitches onto spare needle thread tail cutting the working yarn yarn through tapestry needle and use kitchener stitch to close the work thanks for knitting my pattern tag me in your photos on instagram with #marblefidgetbracelet and #shanalines_designs find out more about me at www shanalines com where you can sign up for my newsletter to get discount codes on future pattern releases shana s cohen shanalines@gmail com march 2024 v1 2 personal use only #marblefidgetbracelet #shanalines_designs 2
